author: IGN
description: Raiders of Blackveil is available now in Steam Early Access. Check out the Raiders of Blackveil early access launch trailer for this co-op rogue-lite game, which blends MOBA-inspired champions, deep RPG loot, and PvE extraction mechanics. Set in a dystopian industrial fantasy world, Raiders of Blackveil follows a rebellion of oppressed animals rising up against the human-run megacorporation Blackveil.
title: Raiders of Blackveil - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: The year 2000 would see the launch of the best-selling console ever and many of the highest-rated games ever. It was an exciting time that felt like gaming was about to explode with new innovations -- but some beloved companies would struggle to adapt to the changing times.
title: The Death of a Giant, the Birth of a Legend: How the Year 2000 Changed Gaming Forever

author: IGN
description:
With James Cameron bringing his reputation as a King of Sequels back to theaters with Avatar: Fire and Ash, it's time to take a look at some of the greatest second chapters Hollywood has given us. Some sequels pick up right where the first movie left off, like Pixar did with The Incredibles 2 or old Hollywood did with The Bride of Frankenstein, while still other sequels may tell a different story altogether, like The Road Warrior or Batman Returns. There's more than one way to follow up a hit, and while not all of them work, they're all worth trying (and writing a CineFix Movie List about!) So here are our picks for 10 of the best movie sequels of all time.

From spectacular middle chapters like The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers or Richard Linklater’s Before Sunset, to admirable franchise entries that flesh out shared universes like Captain America: The Winter Soldier or Hugh Jackman in Logan all the way to the more nebulous spiritual sequels and thematic trilogies that get us fil
title: Top 10 Movie Sequels of All Time | A CineFix Movie List

author: IGN
description:
Terra Invicta gets a new trailer and a version 1.0 release date announcement. Check out the Terra Invicta version 1.0 release date trailer for another look at gameplay and more from this sci-fi grand strategy game. Terra Invicta version 1.0 will be available on Xbox on PC, Epic Games Store, GOG, and Steam on January 5, 2026.

After aliens are detected at the fringes of the Solar System, humanity fractures into seven ideological factions, each with a unique vision of the future, each vying for power among the world’s nations. Lead your chosen faction to take control of Earth’s nations, expand across the Solar System to exploit its resources, and build space-faring ships to battle your enemies in realistic tactical combat.
title: Terra Invicta - Official Version 1.0 Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay of Quarantine Zone: The Last Check in this latest trailer for the upcoming zombie-screening game. Quarantine Zone: The Last Check will be available on PC via Steam on January 12, 2026.

In Quarantine Zone: The Last Check, you must take on the role of a government agent stationed at a critical checkpoint in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. Your job? Screen survivors, manage scarce resources and make impossible moral decisions that determine who gets in — and who doesn’t.

Between juggling food, fuel and defense systems, you’ll also face the human side of survival: trust, desperation and the haunting consequences of every call you make.
title: Quarantine Zone: The Last Check - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The good ol' days of carefree gaming are back! Nitrome is bringing back beloved games of old, re-equipped for modern games. The Nitrome Classics range features select titles from the past, lovingly ported from the ground up to modern formats like Nintendo Switch, Steam, and mobile.
Nitrome Limited is an independent developer of desktop, mobile, and console games, with over 150 titles released since its founding in 2004. Notable titles include Shove Knight Dig and Bomb Chicken, released on Nintendo Switch, and the Leap Day series on Mobile.
The first release, Twin Shots Deluxe, is coming early next year to Steam, Nintendo Switch, and mobile.
title: Nitrome Classics - Official Trailer
